articles.content: An ambulance carrying a coronavirus patient from one Dutch hospital to another was delayed for more than 20 minutes at a motorway tunnel toll booth near the Belgian port of Antwerp until the ambulance paramedic used his personal debit card to pay the 6 charge… [+2019 chars]

articles.author: Stephanie Kelly and Daniel Trotta
articles.title: Coronavirus: New Yorkers cheer arrival of hospital ship as cases soar
articles.description: US Wrap: ‘Wartime atmosphere’ in city with almost half of the country’s Covid-19 cases
articles.content:
People cheered the US Navy hospital ship Comfort as it sailed into New York on Monday, a beacon of the national effort to stanch the coronavirus outbreak at its US epicentre as the number of cases soared.
Painted a gleaming white and adorned with giant red c… [+4542 chars]
